DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess visual performance prototype soft contact lens design compare commercially available contact lenses one-week lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: Dispensing Study Assess Visual Performance Prototype Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , participant-masked , multiple arm , crossover dispense clinical trial participant wear prototype ( test ) commercial ( control ) lenses bilaterally . Participants stratify base refractive error either presbyopic non-presbyopic group . Each stratify group maximum 4 parallel arm . Up 4 test lens design assess control/s parallel arm randomize cross fashion , minimum 2 day washout period lens type . Each lens assessment require 2 schedule clinic attendance - fit visit evaluation visit .
DOC.criteria: Able read comprehend English give inform consent demonstrate signing record inform consent Be least 18 year old , male female Willing comply wear clinical trial visit schedule direct Investigator Have ocular health finding consider `` normal '' would prevent participant safely wear contact lenses Correctable least 6/12 ( 20/40 ) good eye contact lenses Be willing wear contact lenses minimum 2 day stage clinical trial ( informed consent ) Any preexist ocular irritation , injury condition ( include infection disease ) cornea , conjunctiva eyelid would preclude contact lens fit safe wear contact lenses Any systemic disease adversely affect ocular health e.g . diabetes , Graves disease , auto immune diseases ankylose spondylitis , multiple sclerosis , Sj√∂grens syndrome systemic lupus erythematosus . Conditions systemic hypertension arthritis automatically exclude prospective participant Use need concurrent category S3 ocular medication enrolment and/or clinical trial Use need systemic medication topical medication may alter normal ocular finding / know affect participant 's ocular health / physiology contact lens performance either adverse beneficial manner enrolment and/or clinical trial NB : Systemic antihistamine allow `` needed basis '' , provide use prophylactically trial least 24 hour clinical trial product use Eye surgery within 12 week immediately prior enrolment trial . Previous corneal refractive surgery Contraindications contact lens wear Known allergy intolerance ingredient clinical trial product The Investigator may , his/her discretion , exclude anyone believe may able fulfil clinical trial requirement believe participant 's best interest
